articles.title: Former Florida data official creates her own Covid-19 site that shows more cases than state reports

articles.title: Patrick Hutchinson speaks to CNN after carrying opposing demonstrator to safety
articles.description: The photo of Patrick Hutchinson -- a Black Lives Matter supporter who carried an opposing demonstrator away from danger --  has gone viral. He opens up with CNN's Salma Abdelaziz on his move during a protest in London.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Trump's showmanship is now backfiring on him
articles.description: Donald Trump's showmanship -- a key ingredient in his unorthodox reality show-style approach to the presidency -- is beginning to fail him, increasingly emphasizing his disconnect with many Americans and struggles to manage crises besieging the White House.
